text:
Voro | Full Stack Engineer | New York City | Onsite | Full time

We're making it easy to find doctors. Anonymous reviews on zocdoc, yelp and google suck. That's why 70% of people ask their friends for doctor recommendations. We're making it so when you're looking for a doctor it's easily to discover the doctors your friends recommend.

we launched in October and people are people love us. It's not obvious that healthcare is social, but it is. The last time you went to a doctor, how'd you find them? It probably wasn't easy and you probably asked friends. This is one of those obvious ideas that we couldn't believe didn't exist in the world.

We're growing and looking for someone to help us out at engineer #2. You'll have a huge impact on the codebase and product and work directly with the founders to bring our mission of making healthcare easier to life. Join us :)

https://angel.co/voro/jobs/299593-software-engineer
